trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ProgressBar" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ProgressBar" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "ProgressBar".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "ProgressBar".

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor na enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.RangeValue" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate" /> is <see langword="true" />, this method returns the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />; otherwise, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.RangeValue" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate" /> é <see langword="true" />, esse método retorna a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer" />; caso contrário, esse método retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o valor é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: The large-change value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de grandes alterações.

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser definido.
